Sequence Information.Peptide Name: NlmA (chain a of Mutacin IV; Bacteriocin)
Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the class IIb bacteriocin
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Streptococci sanguinis NY101, S. sanguinis ATCC 10556, Streptococcus parasanguinis ATCC 15911, S. oralis TCC 10557, S. mitis ATCC 903, S. mitis ATCC 33399, S. gordonii ATCC 10558, S. crista ATCC 49999, S. sobrinus OMZ176.
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Comments: No comments found on DRAMP database

Literature.Title: The group I strain of Streptococcus mutans, UA140, produces both the lantibiotic mutacin I and a nonlantibiotic bacteriocin, mutacin IV.
Literature.Author: Qi F, Chen P, Caufield PW.
